<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Gets general environment's light settings.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getLighting]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] to format [ambientLightColor, ambientLightBrightness, lightDirection, starsVisibility]:
* ambientLightColor: [[Color|Color (RGB)]]
* ambientLightBrightness: [[Number]]
* lightDirection: [[Vector3D]]
* starsVisibility: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getLighting]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Returns [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0.646753,0.781818,1],28526.2,[-0.0167152,0.211598,-0.977214],0] </value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getLightingAt]] [[moonPhase]] [[Lightpoint Tutorial]]
</value></part></template></root>
